Title: Honey, We Shrunk Ourselves!
Writer: Stuart Gordon (based on characters created by), Brian Yuzna (based on characters created by), Ed Naha (based on characters created by), Karey Kirkpatrick, Nell Scovell, Joel Hodgson
Actors: Rick Moranis, Eve Gordon, Bug Hall, Robin Bartlett
Plot: Mischief device, created by Wayne Szalinski, mess up again - this time not the children have shrunk, but the adults themselves.
